# [Interview #48: LOC Signing Report - Michael Thompson, Entry #5](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=48#5)

#### Robert Jordan

I showed him my Bela '96 button, and he said, "So you're not one of those who think she's a Darkfriend?"
